page.title: 17Central Station
page.content:
In the 1960's the main line station was demolished and Central Stn became part of Merseyrail underground system, forming an intersection for the Wirral Loop Line and the Northern Link Line.
{In 1984 the front half was opened {as a light,clean and spacious shopping {arcade with domed glass roof, twenty- {one shops, hanging baskets of flowers {suspended from the roof and complete {with security guards equipped with two {way radio.
Shoppers and shopkeepers like the arcade but business is quiet during the week,the busiest shops being those which appeal to passing trade. Overall the arcade is a vast improvement to the area but not many people think of it as a place for stopping and looking - still less for serious shopping.
